Name: Trait - Opposition
Desc: The real conflict is a clash of will. Rosetta's fighting spirit burns more fiercely. (Increases damage received from Rosetta.)

Name: Trait - Destiny
Desc: Good and evil are two sides of the same coin. The real battle happens within oneself. (Increases DMG received from Kamui.)

Name: Trait—Melee DMG Boost
Desc: Extra DMG Reduction decreases by 40% within 3m of you (Rosetta will gain a DMG Boost within 3m of you)
